backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles and extensive resident medical types with access-controlled CRUD operations, storing residents and related records in maps with incremental IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping print‑related requirements to affected frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, modals, and print layout.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication flow, profile setup gating, and main app shell rendering.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays ADL records in a table with an optional add-record modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal for adding an ADL record with form fields and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Reusable screen showing an access denied message with a button returning to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a user profile with name, role, and optional related resident IDs, saving via a profile mutation.
Application layout handling Internet Identity login/logout and rendering header, footer, and content.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays MAR records for a resident with an option to add new records if permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal for adding a MAR record by selecting an active medication and entering administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Lists a resident's medications with options to add, edit, or discontinue them when allowed.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal to add a new medication with dosage, timing, physician, and notes, submitting via mutation.
Modal form allowing users to edit an existing medication’s details and submit updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Large modal for adding a new resident, including physicians, contacts, medications, and related info.
Modal for editing an existing resident’s core information, physicians, and pharmacy details.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Print-only component generating a multi-page resident profile report including demographics and medications.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a resident’s recorded daily vitals in a table and provides an option to add new vitals.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Form modal for recording a new set of daily vital signs and submitting them via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, stats, and access‑controlled resident lists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and detailed print-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Utility functions for determining user permissions and mapping user types to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Displays resident management dashboard with filtering, sorting, stats, and actions like add, discharge, and delete.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Shows detailed resident profile with access control, printable report, and optional editing for authorized users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, shared styles, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, existing features, new requests, and metadata for print layout work.
